public abstract class ConnectionTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

An abstract TestCase subclass that provides services for concrete test subclasses that require a database connection; subclasses must implement the getPassword method.

Author:
rmuller

Method Detail

getConnection

protected java.sql.Connection getConnection(IConnectionFactory.DBMS dbms,
                                            java.lang.String subsystem)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            java.io.IOException
Get a connection to the poesystest subsystem. This method calls a private method, getPassword(), to get the database password.

Parameters:
dbms - the kind of DBMS from which to get the connection
subsystem - the subsystem to test; corresponds to the actual test database
Returns:
an open connection to the database
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - when there is a database problem getting the connection
java.io.IOException - when there is a problem reading the database.properties file that initializes connections

getPassword

protected java.lang.String getPassword()
Get the test user password.

Returns:
a database password appropriate to the test suite being run
